### Selected Teaching Influences

These are some of the people whose teaching techniques and insights have had major impacts on my own practice. 

- [Rose Morris-Wright](https://www.rosemorriswright.com) (Department of Mathematics, Middlebury College)
<!-- -  Heather Zinn Brooks (Department of Mathematics, Harvey Mudd) -->

- Don Chodrow (Department of Physics, James Madison University)
- Bill Terry (Staunton High School)
- Don Laliberty-sensei (Aikido Tekkojuku of Boston)
- [Dolita Cathcart](https://wheatoncollege.edu/academics/faculty-directory/dolita-cathcart/)-sensei (Harvard Aikikai, Wheaton College)
- Rick Berry-sensei (Wilmington Aikido)
- [Nicole Eikmeier](https://eikmeier.sites.grinnell.edu) (Department of Computer Science, Grinnell College)
